# llms index (copilot-award-ui-pack)
generated_at: 2026-02-14T04:57:32.002Z
root_count: 1
entry_count: 15

type	name	path	description
agent	Art Direction Planner	.github/agents/art-direction-planner.agent.md	Produces tailored art directions (layout, typography, colour, component language) and a system plan before implementation.
agent	Design System Engineer	.github/agents/design-system-engineer.agent.md	Implements design tokens, typography scale, and atomic components with strict consistency and documentation.
agent	Pixel QA Reviewer	.github/agents/pixel-qa-reviewer.agent.md	Conducts a ruthless pixel-perfect, a11y, and heuristic review and forces closure of visual/interaction gaps.
agent	Screen Composer	.github/agents/screen-composer.agent.md	Composes screens from the design system; ensures grid alignment, hierarchy, states, and polish.
agent	UI Art Director	.github/agents/ui-art-director.agent.md	Designs and implements meticulously crafted, art-directed, award-level UIs using grid/typography/colour systems and rigorous QA.

prompt	brief:tokens-and-typography	.github/prompts/tokens-and-typography.prompt.md	>-
prompt	brief:ui-brief	.github/prompts/ui-brief.prompt.md	Collect a design brief for pixel-perfect, art-directed UI work.
skill	art-direction-intake-and-options	.github/skills/art-direction-intake-and-options/SKILL.md	A rigorous brief intake + 2â€“3 art direction options (layout/type/colour/components), with explicit questions and decision criteria.
skill	design-tokens-and-typography	.github/skills/design-tokens-and-typography/SKILL.md	Define semantic tokens and a typography system; enforce use across components and screens.
skill	layout-composition-grid	.github/skills/layout-composition-grid/SKILL.md	Grid and composition rules for pixel-perfect layouts: columns, gutters, margins, spacing rhythm, optical alignment.
skill	pixel-perfect-qa	.github/skills/pixel-perfect-qa/SKILL.md	A closing checklist that forces elimination of one-off styles, misalignment, weak hierarchy, and a11y gaps.
